data.title: Games like Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb • Games similar to Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb • RAWG
data.meta_description: Games similar to Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb on RAWG ✔ Video game discovery site ✔ The most comprehensive database that is powered by personal...
data.text:
Indiana Jones and the Infernal Machine is an action, adventure and fighting game developed by LucasArts Entertainment and Factor 5. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Disney Interactive. Indiana Jones and the Infernal Machine has a Metascore of 75, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". Indiana Jones and the Infernal Machine is available on Game Boy Color, Nintendo 64 and PC. You can purchase the game on Steam and GOG. It was produced by Wayne Cline. Hal Barwood directed the game. It was scored by Clint Bajakian.

Marc Ecko's Getting Up: Contents Under Pressure is an action-adventure game developed by General Arcade and The Collective. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Atari. On review aggregator Metacritic, Marc Ecko's Getting Up: Contents Under Pressure has a score of 69. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". You can play Marc Ecko's Getting Up: Contents Under Pressure on Xbox, PC and PlayStation 2. The game is sold via Steam. It was produced by Marwan Abderrazzaq and Rick Watters. Marc Ecko and Richard Hare directed the game.

Shenmue I & II is an action, adventure, RPG and simulation game developed by SEGA and d3t. It was originally released in 2018. It was published by SEGA. On review aggregator Metacritic, Shenmue I & II has a score of 74. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. Shenmue I & II is available on PC, Xbox One and PlayStation 4. You can purchase the game on Steam, PlayStation Store and Xbox Store.

Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Chaos Theory is an action-adventure game developed by Ubisoft, Ubisoft Montreal and Gameloft. It was originally released in 2005. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Chaos Theory has a Metascore of 92, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional". You can play Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Chaos Theory on Nintendo DS, PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store, Xbox Store, Steam and Xbox 360 Store. Amon Tobin and Jesper Kyd scored the game.

Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time is an action-adventure game developed by Ubisoft, Ubisoft Montreal and Kudosoft. It was originally released in 2003. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time has a score of 89. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". You can play Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time on PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, Xbox and GameCube. You can purchase the game on GOG, Steam, PlayStation Store and Xbox 360 Store. Yannis Mallat produced the game. Patrice Désilets directed the game. Stuart Chatwood scored the game.

Dark Void is an action, shooter and adventure game developed by Airtight Games. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Capcom. Dark Void has a Metascore of 57, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". You can play Dark Void on PC, PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and Xbox One. The game is sold via Steam, Xbox 360 Store and Xbox Store. It was produced by Jeff Combos and Jim Deal Jeff Combos. Bear McCreary scored the game.

Man O' War: Corsair - Warhammer Naval Battles is an indie, action, adventure and RPG game developed by Evil Twin Artworks. It came out on 15-04-2016. Evil Twin Artworks published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG. You can play Man O' War: Corsair - Warhammer Naval Battles on PC, macOS and Linux. The game is sold via Steam and GOG.

The Evil Within is an action, shooter and adventure game developed by Bethesda Softworks and Tango Gameworks. It came out on 12-10-2014. Bethesda Softworks published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, The Evil Within has a score of 68. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". You can play The Evil Within on PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360 and PC. The game is sold via Epic Games Store, GOG, PlayStation Store and Steam. Masato Kimura produced the game. It was directed by Shinji Mikami. It was scored by Masafumi Takada.

Deadfall Adventures is an action-adventure game developed by The Farm 51. It came out on 14-11-2013. It was published by Nordic Games. On review aggregator Metacritic, Deadfall Adventures has a score of 53. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". Deadfall Adventures is available on Linux, Xbox 360 and PC. The game is sold via Steam and Xbox 360 Store. It was scored by Arkadiusz Reikowski, Jakub Gawlina, Pawel Cincio and Piotr Musial.

Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell is an action-adventure game developed by Ubisoft, Ubisoft Montreal, Ubisoft Toronto and Ubisoft Shanghai. It was originally released in 2002. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell has a Metascore of 91, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell is available on PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, Xbox and Game Boy Advance. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store, Xbox 360 Store, Xbox Store and Steam. It was produced by Mathieu Ferland and Reid Schneider. It was directed by François Coulon and Richard Dumont. Michael Richard Plowman scored the game.

Tomb Raider V: Chronicles is an action, shooter and adventure game developed by Core Design. It was originally released in 2000. Eidos Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". Tomb Raider V: Chronicles is available on Dreamcast, Classic Macintosh, PlayStation and PC. The game is sold via Steam. Andrew Watt produced the game. Peter Connelly scored the game.
